abstract: Axel Axgil, Danish advocate for gay rights, dies at age 96.
snippet: Mr. Axgil was a founder of one of the oldest gay rights groups in Europe and helped make Denmark the first country to legalize same-sex partnerships.

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Same-Sex Marriage, Civil Unions and Domestic Partnerships

lead_paragraph: Mr. Axgil was a founder of one of the oldest gay rights groups in Europe and helped make Denmark the first country to legalize same-sex partnerships.

headline.main: Axel Axgil, Danish Advocate for Gay Rights, Dies at 96
